text:
Is there a way to do a page redirect in hubl? I want to check some query variables on my 404 page to return someone to the blog or home page depending on the variables.  I don't want the 404 page to load up.  

I'm pretty sure I can't do it based off of the query variable as a url redirect, because the 404 page doesn't really have a url, and this query variable will be put on all redirects from a previous domain.
you could do it with a simple html redirect and some if thens based on the query
and only redirect if it doesn't ahve a page
how can I see developer info for a 404 page?
